message: Let's be reasonable, I'm willing to give you a bit less than half to end this quickly.
I appreciate your generosity, but I think we can both do better.  Let's split it more evenly.
I see you want a fair split, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Let's meet in the middle of our previous offers.
Let's be practical.  We both lose money with each round.  A 50/50 split is the fairest way to maximize our gains.
